idea: We are in the business of creating trendiest designs and manufacturing state of the art embroidered fabric for all types of garments for women and children. Including laces and trimmings, home furnishings and ethnic Indian wear. Currently manufacturing 200,000 meters a day and employing over about 80 people. With the right investment in infrastructure we can then not only increase our Schiffli Embroidery output 5 fold but also forward integrate into manufacturing garments thus creating employment for over 500 more people as well as be able to do further R&D into latest, more sustainable and home grown fabrics and yarns such as hemp, water resistant, anti microbial, etc.
name: ExpoTrade Corporation

name: Satyam Stationery & printers

idea:
We are the "BookMyShow" for nightlife i.e. the one-stop-shop for all nightlife events happening in the country. Party-goers no longer need to go through traditional promoters to gain entry to a club. 

1. For the consumers we are creating a consolidated listing with features such a nightlife on-the-go, transparent pricing, quicker entries, cutting down their reliance on friends etc.

2. For the organisers, we seek to minimise middlemen and communication, increase conversion rates while providing them with real time data analysis tools for every event to maximise efficiency and profits.

And, although we’re a technology business, at our heart we’re a social platform that is about getting people to have “real life” experiences with friends.
name: SortMyScene

idea: Ingenium Marine specialises in creating innovative solutions to enable digital driven transformation in the marine industry. We have revolutionised compliance reporting by digiting Oil Pollution Prevention Related log keeping and have created business intelligence solutions aimed improving profitability and operational efficiency of ship owning and ship operating companies
name: INGENIUM MARINE SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
